short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A landscape-changing INTEGRATION that not only ease users' life while using Canva but also provides cuttting-edge AI models

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Canva-integration that uses Connects API to provide the best of accessibility, and AI toolkit for users at their disposal so that they can quickly and effectively create new assets, and do much more
